pageContext.claim: “We are doing very precise Medical Screenings at our airports. Pardon the interruptions and delays, we are moving as quickly as possible, but it is very important that we be vigilant and careful. We must get it right. Safety first!”
pageContext.analysis: Despite efforts for greater traveler safety, airports saw long lines with people standing close together for hours. Moreover, many travelers “expressed surprise Sunday that the health checks were not more stringent and generally did not include temperature checks,” the Washington Post reported.
